channel.title: briefUpdatesMainNLbreakingNews
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from briefUpdatesMainNLbreakingNews, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Ukraine authorities order mass evacuations from around devastated Kupiansk
Residents uncover government workers engaging in illegal scheme: 'We asked why they were doing this'
Man gains access to girlfriend inside Okla. Co. Detention Center after allegedly posing as an attorney
Experts raise red flags after noticing dangerous trend contributing to house fires: 'Don't leave them … unattended or overnight'
Masked fighters seen executing men in Gaza City as Hamas fights with rival groups
2 hikers hospitalized after encountering grizzly bear with 2 cubs on trail
item.description: Two hikers were attacked by a grizzly bear after they encountered the mother and her two cubs on a trail in Canada, authorities said.

item.title: At least 20 dead in bus fire on highway in India, police say
item.description: At least 20 people were killed in a bus fire on a highway in western India, police say, adding that a jammed door kept many passengers from escaping.

item.title: Storm decimates 2 Alaskan villages and drives more than 1,500 people from their homes
item.description: Officials in Alaska are rushing to find housing for people from tiny coastal villages devastated by the remnants of Typhoon Halong.

item.title: Which major airports are refusing to show DHS shutdown video
item.description: The roughly 30-second video began rolling out to airports last week, according to DHS.

item.title: Humanitarian workers detail challenges getting aid into Gaza despite ceasefire
item.description: Humanitarian workers said they will face many challenges delivering aid to Gaza including border restrictions and trying to access destroyed roads.

item.title: 9/10: CBS Morning News
item.description: Poland says it shot down Russian drones that entered its airspace during Russian attack on Ukraine; Major U.S. jobs revisions point to weak labor mark...

item.title: Guns, drugs worth $170 million seized in raid linked to "kill team" hit
item.description: Police images showed drug packages emblazoned with a picture of a cartoon bear from the 2012 comedy "Ted." Another bag featured Chinese characters rea...

item.title: The government shutdown is putting a renewed spotlight on the cracks in the US aviation system
NYC mayoral hopeful Sliwa blasts Mamdani and Cuomo, urges Trump to stay out of race
item.description: New York City Republican mayoral candidate Curtis Sliwa told CBS News President Trump should stay out of the race — arguing that he's strengthening Zo...

item.title: Trump officials back firm in fight over California offshore oil drilling after huge spill
Meta scraps Facebook page tracking ICE agents in Chicago, at DOJ's request
item.description: Meta has removed a Facebook page used to track the presence of immigration agents at the request of the Department of Justice, the company confirmed o...

item.title: WATCH: Gorilla smashes glass at San Diego Zoo
item.description: Eyewitness video captured the heart-stopping moment a gorilla rushed the glass at a viewing enclosure in the San Diego Zoo.

item.title: WATCH: SpaceX launches 11th test flight of Starship mega rocket
item.description: SpaceX launched another of its mammoth Starship rockets on a test flight Monday, successfully making it halfway around the world.
